trends: There have been no other sightings in Salterforth
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: i looked out the back of my house and in the sky was a white oval shaped object that floated seamlessly across the sky, then a plane lower than the object flew past it as it disappeared in the clouds out of sight
divs: Sighting Detailsi was rolling my cigarette to go for a smoke at about 16:00 i opened my backdoor to go outside,i looked across the sky as i usually do, and there was this white oval object that didn't change shape or size but flew in a straight line towards a small cloud behind a house that cut off my view from it,it was roughly the length of a plane but it flew higher, i know this because a plane flew the opposite direction more lower than the object, i was hoping to see it again after it flew behind the house as it was the direction it was flying, however it didn't it just disappeared in the clouds, i didn't feel any different from seeing it, it was more of an awe like a "wow" feeling mixed with "wtf!?" as it was different after i knew it went i rushed to the internet and typed in "what to do if you see a UFO for real" i ended up on MUFON because i needed to tell someone quickly, and now im feeling a little bit curious. i know its legit because i saw it and i could draw it whenever wherever with whatever i can, it was real, i saw a UFO.
